entries.title: ChatGPT Creator Releases Tool to Detect AI-Generated Text, Calls It 'Unreliable'
entries.description: OpenAI says the AI-detection tool complements methods educators, employers and others use to determine the source of a piece of text.

entries.title: AMD's Profit Plunges Amid Weaker PC Sales
entries.description: The chip maker reported a 98% decline in net income for the fourth quarter as operating expenses more than doubled and sales linked to its PC clients were cut in half.

entries.title: Elon Musk Warned About Incoming EU Social-Media Law
entries.description: Thierry Breton, the bloc’s internal market commissioner, says the EU will be vigilant in monitoring Twitter’s compliance.

entries.title: Snap Warns of Sales Drop After Revenue Growth Stalls
entries.description: Snapchat’s parent company is struggling to revive growth amid upheaval in digital advertising market

entries.title: Event Software Company Cvent Explores Sale
entries.description: The company has attracted interest from Blackstone Inc. and others for a sale that could value Cvent at upwards of $4 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.

entries.title: Tesla Confirms Justice Department Request for Autopilot Documents
entries.description: The electric-car maker is facing several probes related to its driver-assistance system.

entries.title: CEO Who Quoted Martin Luther King Jr. in Layoff Email Apologizes
entries.description: Jennifer Tejada, chief executive of cloud computing startup PagerDuty, described the use of the quote in her layoff announcement as “inappropriate and insensitive.”

entries.title: How a Tiny Bank in a Washington Farming Town Got Tangled Up With FTX
entries.description: FTX executives discussed using Moonstone bank to offer interest-bearing crypto accounts.

entries.title: Biden Administration Considers Cutting Off Huawei From U.S. Suppliers
entries.description: The U.S. blacklisted the Chinese telecommunications company in 2019 but has granted exceptions for components not deemed a national-security risk.

entries.title: Apple HomePod Review: Big Bass, Big Price
entries.description: Apple’s updated, second-generation smart speaker is for iPhone and Mac owners with larger rooms

entries.title: New China Rule Threatens to Disrupt U.S. Solar Ambitions
entries.description: A plan by China to restrict exports of key solar manufacturing technology could delay attempts to build up a domestic solar supply chain in the U.S., industry experts say.

entries.title: Spotify Adds Users, Reports Loss After Big Investments in Podcasts
entries.description: Spotify reported strong user growth but another quarterly loss after the company invested extensively to build its podcast business.

entries.title: Samsung Expects Sluggish Demand to Drag On as Profit Slides
entries.description: The South Korean tech company saw operating profit drop 69%, hit by falling sales of chips and smartphones as demand for gadgets languishes.
